tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SatelliteImages (
    image_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    image_url TEXT NOT NULL,
    capture_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    location TEXT NOT NULL,
    deforestation_detected BOOLEAN NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE deforestation_activities (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    satellite_id INT,
    location GEOMETRY(Point),
    deforestation_level FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE conservation_efforts (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    initiative_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    location GEOMETRY(Polygon),
    conservation_budget DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE satellite_images (
    image_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_name VARCHAR(255),
    image_url TEXT,
    captured_date DATE,
    region_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (region_id) REFERENCES forest_regions(region_id)
);

CREATE TABLE deforestation_activities (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_type VARCHAR(100),
    activity_date DATE,
    activity_description TEXT,
    image_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (image_id) REFERENCES satellite_images(image_id)
);

CREATE TABLE DeforestationAlerts (
  alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  image_id INT REFERENCES SatelliteImages(image_id),
  alert_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  alert_type VARCHAR(50),
  alert_message TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ConservationEfforts (
  effort_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  effort_name VARCHAR(100),
  effort_description TEXT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE DeforestationAreas (
    area_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    area_name TEXT,
    area_size FLOAT,
    deforestation_level ENUM('Low', 'Medium', 'High'),
    image_id INT
);
